card_text: 2 or more (max. 5) Level 4 Warrior monsters$NOnce per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: Detach 1 material from this card. This card gains effects based on the number of materials attached to it.$N●1+: Cannot be destroyed by battle.$N●2+: Gains 1500 ATK/DEF.$N●3+: Unaffected by other cards' effects.$N●4+: Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters.$N●5: Once per turn: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls.
